name: Forge Washington
ability: Immune to Poison and moderately reduces DMG taken.
Absorbs a portion of DMG dealt as HP.
bond: Increases Forge Washington's skill DMG by 10%

additional_data.description: A spirit created by the legend of George Washington and the cherry tree. He serves a prime example of the way that widespread belief in something can make it real, regardless of whether the original story is true. This pure young man is always striving to work on behalf of the people. Though his outlook may seem limited, he will one day become the leader of the nation. In preparation for this he's been learning about all sorts of things from George Washington.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Event: Defeat LVL 80, 100, 150, 175, 200 Forge Washington.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Event: Random drops after LVL 80.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the total Event Points during the "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" event.

skill: "I won't allow people to be hurt!"
